origin.originstweaks.arachnid.name: Arachnid [OT]
origin.originstweaks.arachnid.descriptio: Dey climbin gud n can make bad guyz go sleepy wif poizun. Arachnidz iz purrfect hunturz.
power.originstweaks.master_of_webs.name: Webz Mastah
power.originstweaks.master_of_webs.descr: Arachnidz iz SO GUD wif webz! Usez dem n walks thru like iz nuthin. Eezee peezy!
badge.originstweaks.master_of_webs.0: ZOOM to block or bad guy (16 blockz away!) wif [Primary]. Like spoder!
badge.originstweaks.master_of_webs.1: Webshot haz 7 chargez n itz full agin in 30 secondz.
badge.originstweaks.master_of_webs.2: U go thru webz like nothin n u can climb dem too.
badge.originstweaks.master_of_webs.3.pre: Put 9 Stringz togethr to make Cobweb.
badge.originstweaks.master_of_webs.3.suf: If u sneak n break web, u getz ur 9 stringz bak. Iz liek recycling!.
power.originstweaks.venom.name: Venom
power.originstweaks.venom.description: Arachnidz can put poizun in bad guyz to make dem weak.
badge.originstweaks.venom.0: Push [Secondary] to switch betweeen climbin n sleepy juice power.
badge.originstweaks.venom.1: Sumtimez ur punchies gib poizun. Surprise!
power.originstweaks.climbing.name: Climbin
power.originstweaks.climbing.description: U can go up any wall, not just ladderz.
badge.originstweaks.climbing.0: Push [Secondary] to switch betweeen climbin n sleepy juice power.
power.originstweaks.arthropod.name: Arthropod
power.originstweaks.arthropod.descriptio: U iz smol bug-peep n u fall soft liek fluff. No big ouchie.
badge.originstweaks.arthropod.1: Only getz fallin ouchie if drop iz mor than 16 blockz.
badge.originstweaks.arthropod.2: Cuz u iz bug-peep, teh Bane of Bugz majik hurtz u MOAR.
origin.originstweaks.avian.name: Avian [OT]
origin.originstweaks.avian.description: Teh bird peepz forgot how to fly fly long time ago. Now dey just glide soft n gentle like featherz.
power.originstweaks.slow_falling.name: Featherweight
power.originstweaks.slow_falling.descrip: U fall SO SLOW, liek fluffy feather floatin down.
badge.originstweaks.slow_falling.0: Click [Secondary] to turn on or off.
power.originstweaks.animal_friendship.de: Critterz feel safe near u! U can make frendz wifout noms or shiny stuff. Just needz boop!
badge.originstweaks.animal_friendship.0: Boop critter wif [Primary] to make frend. Haz cooldown (2 minz). Be patient!
badge.originstweaks.animal_friendship.1: Frendz include: Wolfiez, Kittehs, Birdiez, Horsez, Donkeyz, Mulez, n Fluffy Llamaz.
badge.originstweaks.animal_friendship.2: Other critterz liek axolotlz, foxiez, n spotty kittehs trust u, no run away! Dey even help u fight! Yay frendz!
power.originstweaks.green_thumb.name: Green Thumb
power.originstweaks.green_thumb.descript: U iz SO GUD at growin plantz n gettin noms from dem.
badge.originstweaks.green_thumb.0: If u use hoe to pick plantz, u get more stuff.
badge.originstweaks.green_thumb.1: Wen u pick carrotz, melon, n applez, sumtimez u get SHINY GOLD one!
badge.originstweaks.green_thumb.2: U can nom teh sparkly melon slicez. YUM
origin.originstweaks.blazeborn.name: Blazeborn [OT]
origin.originstweaks.blazeborn.descripti: Da kidz of da Blaze, dey dont get hurt by da fire in da Nether.
power.originstweaks.burning_wrath.name: Burnin Wrath
power.originstweaks.burning_wrath.descri: Long time ago, Blazeborn use fire to help dem fight n live.
badge.originstweaks.burning_wrath.0: Make urself on fire for 30 secondz by pushin [Primary].
badge.originstweaks.burning_wrath.1: Wen u iz on fire, ur punchies hit HARDER (125%!) n set bad guyz on fire too!
badge.originstweaks.burning_wrath.2: Use ur fire powah to light Campfirez or fuel Furnacez n Brewin Standz. Very handy!
power.originstweaks.firecharged_projecti: U can throw fire ballz at bad guyz.
power.originstweaks.fire_immunity.name: Fire Immunity
power.originstweaks.fire_immunity.descri: Fire cant hurt u at all n u can swim in lava.
origin.originstweaks.elytrian.name: Elytrian [OT]
origin.originstweaks.elytrian.descriptio: Dey like flyin in da wind. Dey sad if no space above dem.
power.originstweaks.gift_of_the_skies.de: Evolushun gib u wingz! U can fly fly all ovr teh place! WHEE!
badge.originstweaks.gift_of_the_skies.0: Push [Primary] to go high up from ground or go up while floatin.
badge.originstweaks.gift_of_the_skies.1: U haz limited juice. Launchin n goin up usez it. Rest on ground to catch ur breaf!
badge.originstweaks.gift_of_the_skies.2: Harder to fly if ur armor is more than 12.
badge.originstweaks.gift_of_the_skies.3: Boom boom stickz while floatin r dangerouz.
power.originstweaks.companion_mounting.d: Ur frendz can ride on ur bak! But if u crash or get hit by pointy thing, dey fall off.
badge.originstweaks.companion_mounting.0: Can kick frendz off any time wif [Secondary].
power.originstweaks.aerial_combatant.des: U hit SO HARD after flyin for 3 secondz.
badge.originstweaks.aerial_combatant.0: If u hit while flyin, itz 2x (punch) or 1.5x (shoot) harder.
origin.originstweaks.enderian.name: Enderian [OT]
origin.originstweaks.enderian.descriptio: Born az kidz of teh Ender Dragon! Enderianz can POOF teleport, but water iz big SCARY!
power.originstweaks.throw_ender_pearl.de: Wen u want, throw ender pearl dat no hurt u, n POOF! U iz somewher else.
power.originstweaks.slender_body.name: Long Boi Body
power.originstweaks.slender_body.descrip: Ur body iz liek ur Endermen frendz. U iz TALL, reach far, grab blockz, n can WHOOSH dodge smol projectiles..
badge.originstweaks.slender_body.0: U iz 2.5 blockz tall n can reach 1.5 timez far az hooman.
badge.originstweaks.slender_body.1: Can dodge projectiles wif teleport (WHOOSH!). Haz 5 sec cooldown.
badge.originstweaks.slender_body.2: Can break blockz wif SILKY TOUCH using just ur handz! No toolz needed!
origin.originstweaks.feline.name: Kitteh [OT]
origin.originstweaks.feline.description: Wif ur kitteh lookz, Creeperz get SCARED n run away! Also haz kitteh grace, alwayz landin on ur pawz.
power.originstweaks.natural_hunter.name: Kitteh Hunter
power.originstweaks.natural_hunter.descr: Kittehs iz natural hunterz! Ur clawz can be sharpened for MOAR damage. Fishy noms iz extra yummy n fillin.
badge.originstweaks.natural_hunter.0: Use [Primary] wif empty pawz to attack wif ur CLAWZ!
badge.originstweaks.natural_hunter.1: Sharpen Clawz on blockz liek dis: Logz/Wool (4 DMG), Smooth Stone/Polished Rockz (5 DMG), Iron Block (6 DMG), Diamond Block (7 DMG)!
badge.originstweaks.natural_hunter.2: Claw attackz haz less knockback, gud for fast attack comboz! Swat swat swat!
badge.originstweaks.natural_hunter.3: Noms made from fishiez gib +3 hungerz n +2 saturationz
power.originstweaks.dexterity.name: Acrocatics
power.originstweaks.dexterity.descriptio: Cuz u like kitty, u can move around reel eezee.
badge.originstweaks.dexterity.0: Hold [Sneak] to charge jump, den press [Jump] for BIG leap!
badge.originstweaks.dexterity.1: U jump lil bit higher wen u run fast.
badge.originstweaks.dexterity.2: U NEVER take fallin ouchies! Land on ur feetz from ANY height! Like real kitteh!
power.originstweaks.weak_arms.name: Weak Pawz
power.originstweaks.weak_arms.descriptio: Ur pawz iz weak! No dig stone fast liek hoomans. Sum stonez iz too tuff, cannot dig AT ALL!
badge.originstweaks.weak_arms.0: U mine natural stonez n ore blockz 50% SLOWER.
badge.originstweaks.weak_arms.1: U cant break TUFF stonez liek deep dark rock, deep dark shiny stone, sob stone, black stone.
badge.originstweaks.weak_arms.2: Dis can be fixed wif Strength potionz or pickaxe wif Efficiency majik!
power.originstweaks.cat_vision.name: Kitteh Vision
power.originstweaks.cat_vision.descripti: U can see when itz reel dark.
badge.originstweaks.cat_vision.0: Click [Secondary] to turn on or off.
origin.originstweaks.merling.name: Merling [OT]
origin.originstweaks.merling.description: U live in da water, so u no like bein out too long.
power.originstweaks.aquadynamic.name: Aqua-dynamikz
power.originstweaks.aquadynamic.descript: U iz gud wif water physiks! Makes u better wif Tridentz underwater n u know how to craft dem.
badge.originstweaks.aquadynamic.0: U deal 1.5x damage wif Tridentz under water.
power.originstweaks.swim_speed.name: Finz Power!
power.originstweaks.swim_speed.descripti: Ur swimmin speed iz faster! Can DASH wif 5 sec cooldown.
badge.originstweaks.swim_speed.0: Push [Sprint] to DASH while swimmin fast.
badge.originstweaks.swim_speed.1: Dis power makez u swim even faster wit Depth Strider magic.
power.originstweaks.aquatic.name: Water Born
power.originstweaks.aquatic.description: U spawn in teh ocean naturally. Impaling majik hurtz u MOAR.
power.originstweaks.body_moisture.name: Stay Wet
power.originstweaks.body_moisture.descri: Ur body needz water! Can stay out for 10 minz. If moisture bar empty, u cant breathe!
badge.originstweaks.body_moisture.0: Go in water, stand in water pot, or drink water bottle to get water bak.
badge.originstweaks.body_moisture.1: Teh Nether iz TOO HOT! Drains ur water 2x faster!
badge.originstweaks.body_moisture.2: Magic water thingy lastz longer n keepz ur body wet.
origin.originstweaks.phantom.name: Phantom [OT]
origin.originstweaks.phantom.description: U iz half-hooman, half-phantom! Can switch forms n go INVISIBLE!
power.originstweaks.phantomize.name: Go Ghost
power.originstweaks.phantomize.descripti: Can switch between hooman n invisible phantom form if u haz enuf soul energy.
badge.originstweaks.phantomize.0: Switch betweeen hooman n ghost by pushin [Primary].
power.originstweaks.phasing.name: Phase Thru Stuff
power.originstweaks.phasing.description: While phantom, can move thru solid stuff! (Except sob stone n solid shiny blockz).
badge.originstweaks.phasing.0: Phasing usez soul energy FAST! Keep eye on bar!
badge.originstweaks.phasing.1: U cant run fast, swim, fly, hit, or touch blockz when u all phasing.
power.originstweaks.soulbound.name: Soul Power
power.originstweaks.soulbound.descriptio: U needz soul energy to use phantom form. Iz ur fuel!
badge.originstweaks.soulbound.0: Soul energy comez bak slowlie. Can also NOM it from dead mobs or stand near soul fire! Yummy souls!
power.originstweaks.spectral_wail.name: Spooky Wail
power.originstweaks.spectral_wail.descri: Can let out a WAIL dat reveals other critter and peepz nearby. See thru wallz!
badge.originstweaks.spectral_wail.1: Teh Wail highlights any critter or peep in 32-block radius. Found u!
power.originstweaks.aurophobia.name: No Shinies!
power.originstweaks.aurophobia.descripti: Gold iz yucky n repels u.
badge.originstweaks.aurophobia.0: Cannot nom golden foodz, wear golden armor, use golden toolz, or phase thru gold blockz.
origin.originstweaks.shulk.name: Shulk [OT]
origin.originstweaks.shulk.description: Like Shulkerz, ur body haz hard shell skin.
power.originstweaks.natural_armor.name: Shell Skin
power.originstweaks.natural_armor.descri: Even wif no armor, ur shell protect u.
badge.originstweaks.natural_armor.1: Hold [Sneak] to hide in shell! Gain up to 7 extra armor pointz.
badge.originstweaks.natural_armor.2: Takin big hit (3+ heartz) reduce bonus shell by 1 n stops shell build for 30 sec.
power.originstweaks.antigravity_pellet.d: Can shoot shulker bullet OR make urself float up up up!
badge.originstweaks.antigravity_pellet.1: Make urself float wif [Secondary] while sneakin.
origin.originstweaks.vanilla_elytra.name: Normal Wingz
origin.originstweaks.vanilla_elytra.desc: Ur wingz look like normal wingz. U can use fancy wing packz n cape picturez.
origin.originstweaks.custom_wings.name: Fancy Wingz
origin.originstweaks.custom_wings.descri: Ur wingz use special picture dat not like normal wingz. U can haz reel cool look dat other wingz dont do. Look in OriginsTweaks Releases for how to make ur own!
origin.originstweaks.no_render.name: No Wingz
origin.originstweaks.no_render.descripti: No wingz show up. Good if u fly wifout wingz or use special wing modelz from other stuff like Figura.
advancement.originstweaks.arachnid.bane_: Get ouchie from pointy stick wif Bane of Bugz V magic.
advancement.originstweaks.arachnid.poiso: Make all kindz of bad guyz n friendz go sleepy wif ur sleepy juice at least one time.
advancement.originstweaks.arachnid.websh: Shoot ur web 7 timez wifout touchin ground or climbin.
advancement.originstweaks.avian.root.des: U pick da Bird Peep thingy.
advancement.originstweaks.avian.buildlim: Go sleepy sleepy way up high (at least 300 blockz).
advancement.originstweaks.avian.harvest_: Pick or make shiny gold carrot, shiny melon, or shiny gold apple.
advancement.originstweaks.avian.speed.de: Go reel fast! Like 2 timez faster than hooman!
advancement.originstweaks.avian.tame.des: Make animal ur friend wifout givin dem stuff.
advancement.originstweaks.blazeborn.root: U pick da Fire Peep thingy.
advancement.originstweaks.blazeborn.fuel: Fire Iz Food. Fire Place Iz Full.
Use ur fire power to make campfire, brew stand, n furnace work.
advancement.originstweaks.blazeborn.kill: Beat da Wither in da fire place cuz u r fire peep.
advancement.originstweaks.blazeborn.lava: Go swimmy swim in da hot water.
advancement.originstweaks.blazeborn.reac: Go to da normal world cuz u r fire peep.
U pick da Wing Peep thingy.
advancement.originstweaks.elytrian.crash: Get reel big ouchie (7 heartz or more) all at once from fallin hard.
advancement.originstweaks.elytrian.fligh: Shoot sumthin after floatin for at least 3 secondz.
advancement.originstweaks.elytrian.playe: Let ur friend sit on u n go fly fly.
advancement.originstweaks.elytrian.y_700: Go way up high (Y level 700) cuz u can fly.
U pick da Poof Peep thingy.
advancement.originstweaks.enderian.max_w: Wear armor wif Water Protect 4 magic.
advancement.originstweaks.enderian.punch: Punch peep or animal wearin pumpkin head.
advancement.originstweaks.feline.root.de: U pick da Kitty Peep thingy.
advancement.originstweaks.feline.break_t: Break hard rock wif strong arm or fast diggin.
advancement.originstweaks.feline.cooked_: Carry full stack of cooked fishy in ur bag.
advancement.originstweaks.feline.sharp_c: Use wood, smooth rock, metal block, n shiny block to make ur clawz reel sharp.
advancement.originstweaks.feline.sleep_i: Go sleepy sleepy in town wif big metal friend near by.
advancement.originstweaks.merling.root.d: U pick da Fish Peep thingy.
advancement.originstweaks.merling.clear_: Make big water place free of bad big fishy.
advancement.originstweaks.merling.condui: Put water magic thing in right water rock frame n get power.
advancement.originstweaks.merling.loyalt: Put magic on pointy stick so it comez bak n shoot lightnin.
advancement.originstweaks.merling.nether: Go to da hot place cuz u r fish peep.
advancement.originstweaks.phantom.root.d: U pick da Ghost Peep thingy.
advancement.originstweaks.phantom.absorb: Take ghost power from big bad ghost.
Take ghost power from blue fire.
advancement.originstweaks.phantom.phase_: Hit peep or animal when u half in da ground.
advancement.originstweaks.phantom.spectr: Hear bad guyz or peepz thru wallz wif ur ghost yell.
advancement.originstweaks.shulk.root.des: U pick da Shell Peep thingy.
advancement.originstweaks.shulk.inventor: Put stuff in ur shell bag.
advancement.originstweaks.shulk.max_armo: Wear armor n make ur shell strong till u haz 30 safe pointz.
advancement.originstweaks.shulk.shulker_: Cuz u r shell peep, get hit by other shell peep's shooty thing.
advancement.originstweaks.shulk.tank_war: Let teh big bad Warden hit u wifout any armor.
